column1: International Development, Social Justice and Sustainability
column3: Department of Social and Policy Sciences
column5: Further your understanding of the political, economic and social forces that promote or prevent social and environmental justice around the world.If you are interested in studying the part-time version of this course, please visit our website.During this specialist master’s, you’ll enhance your knowledge and understanding of international development, social justice, wellbeing, and environmental sustainability.You’ll critically examine the many political, economic and social factors that lead to inequality across the planet. These include people’s struggles for wellbeing and sustainability, and the visions that inspire them; and the roles of state, society and market factors.
